sentences.en: And again, Praise the Lord, all ye Gentiles; and laud him, all ye people.
sentences.cn: 11又说, 外邦阿, 你们当赞美主. 万民哪, 你们都当颂赞他.

sentences.en: Even if Mr Obama had been so inclined , this was no time to laud private enterprise.
sentences.cn: 即使奥巴马有心, 他也不适合在那个时候称赞私营企业.

sentences.en: He lauded the work of the UN High Commissioner for Refugees.
sentences.cn: 他赞扬了联合国难民事务高级专员的工作。

sentences.en: I laud the people of Lijang.
sentences.cn: 我可是赞美丽江的人民.

sentences.en: Kathy was very pleased to have graduated cum laud in her class.
sentences.cn: 凯西在班上以优等成绩毕业,她为此而非常高兴.

sentences.en: One generation will laud Your works to another, And they will declare Your mighty acts.
sentences.cn: 4这一代要对另一代称颂你的作为, 他们要传扬你的大能.

sentences.en: People laud the corporate hero -- the person going above and beyond -- but not corporate martyrs, who have killed themselves and potentially put the business in a compromised situation.
sentences.cn: 人们会称赞公司的英雄-那个很厉害的人，但是不会称赞公司的殉难者，那些不仅让自己壮烈牺牲还给公司带来潜在性伤害的人。

sentences.en: Queen's imperial concubine saw, also laud her.
sentences.cn: 王后妃嫔见了, 也赞美她.

sentences.en: We laud him a warmhearted man.
sentences.cn: 我们称赞他是个热心人.

words.tran_cn: 值得赞赏地；可嘉地；可佩地

trans.tran_cn: 赞美, 称赞, 颂歌
